title: Can I assign a single ring tone for all of my contacts without having to do it one at a time?
content: I have tried to find a way to do it with no luck. I was able to do it with my old LGv20 phone so I would know if an incoming call was from one of my contacts or not (driving) without having to look at my phone.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
